mapper.insert: insert into user(userID, userIdentity, username, password, image) values (#{userID}, #{userIdentity}, #{username}, #{password}, #{image})
mapper.select: select userID, username, realName, image, userDegree, userIdentity, organization, emailAddress, phoneNumber from user where userID = #{ID} or username = #{ID} or emailAddress = #{ID} limit 0,1
